title: onpremises environments
extract: On-premises software (also known as on-premise, and abbreviated "on-prem") is installed and runs on computers on the premises of the person or organization using the software, rather than at a remote facility such as a server farm or cloud.
extract_html: On-premises software (also known as on-premise, and abbreviated "on-prem") is installed and runs on computers on the premises of the person or organization using the software, rather than at a remote facility such as a server farm or cloud.
